amendment.description: Amendment sought to adjust the threshold of the volume of business conducted by an enterprise before it would come under the jurisdiction of the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB).
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 64 in the Congressional Record of September 10, 1997, to adjust the threshold of the volume of business conducted by a company which would place it under the jurisdiction of the National Labor Relations Board (NLRB).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 235 (Roll no. 392).
